ISSUE.TITLE: Desing issue on Apply for Vendor page
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.20 Beta Issue: Design issue on apply for vendor page Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Login in Store 2. Scroll to bottom and click to Apply for Vendor link 3. See, there is design issue with title. ![Apply For Vendor](https://i.ibb.co/NjZ56mQ/vendor-apply.png)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #3719 Allow to change plugin display order at runtime
